client_id.comments: client id for on cat; it is unique for Shiver

use_notes.comments: the flag (bool: true/false) indicates the location of the names of the datasets (notes/comments vs. sequence name)

keep_logs.comments: the flag indicates whether to keep all logs (True) or keep only the necessary logs : SequenceName phi chi omega pause proton_charge run_title EnergyRequest psda psr s2 msd + additional_logs (False)

additional_logs._comment: for ini list is an empty field
additional_logs.comments: list of additional logs, the default values (SequenceName phi chi omega pause proton_charge run_title EnergyRequest psda psr s2 msd) are always included.

display_title.comments: when the display_title is set to full: dimension data, name_only: workspace title, no_title: no title is printed in plots

logarithmic_intensity.comments: the flag indicates the plot scale logarithmic (true) or not (false)

save_instrument.comments: the flag indicates whether the data are saved as sample logs in the MDHistogram workspace

save_sample.comments: save sample information in the MDH file

save_logs.comments: save logs in the MDH file

save_history.comments: save history in the MDH file

help_url.comments: the url for the help button

version.comments: version is populated during the creation of the configuration file based on the current software's version, this is the default one
